summary: The established relationship between university student Bruno and aspiring photographer Carla is thrown into turmoil when Bruno feels drawn to sexy karate instructor/break dancer Rai. Complications ensue.
cast: Astrid Bergès-Frisbey|Álvaro Cervantes|Llorenç González|Sonia Méndez|Julieta Marocco|Lluïsa Castell|Marc Garcia Coté|Marc Pociello|Ricard Farré|Ana Cimini|Marcel Tomàs|Jacobo Pérez|Jordi Turró|Livia Gaudenco|Giancarlo Olaro|Deloar Haque|Sara Miquel|Marta Trujillo|Jordi Mendieta|Alexandre Novell|Dario Beck|Berta Pons|Clara Pons|Carlos Carmona|Ángel Patiño|Camilo Sampayo|Jean Philippe Barrios|Guillermo Forero|Robert González
title: El sexo de los ángeles
